class gstShape : public gstBoundedHapticObj

Base class for haptic geometry nodes.

From header file: gstShape.h

Constructors and Destructors
~gstShapeDestructor.
gstShapeThis class is intended as a base class only, the constructors are protected so that instances can not be created.
